front.title: ISO/IEEE International Standard Health informatics - Point-of-care medical device communication - Transport profile - Infrared
front.abstract: This standard establishes a connection-oriented transport profile and physical layer suitable for medical device communications that use short-range infrared wireless. This standard defines communications services and protocols that are consistent with specifications of the Infrared Data Association (IrDA) and are optimized for point-of-care (POC) applications at or near the patient.
